member.name: T:DG.Audio.DeAudioManager
member.summary: Global AudioManager. Must be instantiate only once per project (either manually or via code).

member.name: M:DG.Audio.DeAudioManager.PrecacheSources(DG.Audio.DeAudioType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates the given amount of sources, if within the set max limits

member.name: M:DG.Audio.DeAudioManager.Play(DG.Audio.DeAudioType,UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Plays the given clip with the given options

member.name: M:DG.Audio.DeAudioManager.Play(DG.Audio.DeAudioType,UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Plays the given clip with the given options
